thread.title: ‘A bunch of scumbags’: Rep. Maxine Waters attacks President Trump and his ‘Kremlin Klan’
thread.title_full: ‘A bunch of scumbags’: Rep. Maxine Waters attacks President Trump and his ‘Kremlin Klan’

author: William A.
title: ‘A bunch of scumbags’: Rep. Maxine Waters attacks President Trump and his ‘Kremlin Klan’
text:
‘A bunch of scumbags’: Rep. Maxine Waters attacks President Trump and his ‘Kremlin Klan’ Posted at 10:41 pm on February 21, 2017 by William A. 
This happened Tuesday night on MSNBC’s “All in with Chris Hayes”: Rep. @MaxineWaters : Trump friends and advisors with ties to Russia are "a bunch of scumbags" #inners https://t.co/L8EBBvAQ3i 
— All In w/Chris Hayes (@allinwithchris) February 22, 2017 
And she tweeted this out also: I'll be joining the hosts on @TheRealDaytime tomorrow, discussing @realDonaldTrump and his #kremlinklan . Please tune in! pic.twitter.com/4YBFYurKXX 
— Maxine Waters (@MaxineWaters) February 22, 2017 
Kremlin Klan … that’s double the triggering! Now we need the nickname for hardcore Maxine Waters fans, because they’re out there.
